help-file.title: SHOUT
help-file.content:
Syntax: shout <text> toggle shout
"Shout" sends a message to all players within a certain range of you. If you are in a zone, the message will only be heard by those in that particular zone. If you are on the world map, the message will only be heard by those on that particular continent. In order to hear shouts, you must be conscious and have shout toggled on.
